1.0.name: wordpress/shorter-links
1.0.description:
The Shorter Links WordPress plugin overrides the default WordPress "shortlink" URL with one that has a custom text in it. You can also set a different base URL.

A custom field called "Shorter link" is created once a post is saved, so that you can change the shortlink to a more memorable set of characters.

The choice of base URL to use for the short link can be configured within Settings->Shorter Links.

Related Links:

  • Plugin home page
